name: Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint - N 28 | 12-Hour Stunning Matte Finish | 5 Star Rated
description:
Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint - N 28: The Ultimate Long-Lasting Lip Color

Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint - N 28 delivers intense color payoff with a stunning velvety matte finish that lasts all day. This premium lip paint combines the precision of a liquid lipstick with the comfort of a lightweight formula, ensuring your lips stay vibrant without feeling dry or cakey. 💋

The shade N 28 offers a beautiful deep mauve tone that complements a wide range of skin tones, making it perfect for both everyday wear and special occasions. The highly pigmented formula requires just one application for full coverage that won't fade, feather, or transfer.

Product Information

Size 5ml
Product Type Liquid Lipstick
Finish Extreme Matte
Brand Name Instyle
Shade N 28

Key Features of Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint - N 28

  • Long-lasting formula that stays put for up to 12 hours
  • Non-drying comfort enriched with moisturizing ingredients
  • Precision applicator for flawless application
  • Transfer-proof technology that won't smudge or fade
  • Cruelty-free and free from harmful chemicals

How to Apply Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint

For best results, exfoliate lips before application. Use the precision applicator to outline lips, then fill in with color. Allow to dry completely for maximum longevity. For an even more defined look, pair with Instyle Precision Lip Liner.

The Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint - N 28 is part of Instyle's renowned collection of high-performance lip products that combine cutting-edge formulations with on-trend colors. This particular shade has become a bestseller for its versatility and flattering undertones. 💄

Complete Your Look

Pair your Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint - N 28 with these complementary products:

  • Instyle Flawless Foundation
  • Instyle Volumizing Mascara
  • Instyle Highlighting Powder

Frequently Asked Question

How do I prevent my matte lip paint from drying out my lips?
While the Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint - N 28 is formulated with hydrating ingredients, you can enhance comfort by applying a thin layer of lip balm before application. Allow the balm to absorb for a few minutes, then blot away any excess before applying your lip paint. This creates a smooth canvas while adding extra moisture protection. 💦
short_description: Experience intense color with Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint - N 28. This long-lasting, transfer-proof formula delivers rich mauve pigment with a velvety matte finish that stays comfortable all day. Perfect for creating bold, defined lips.
